items.sentence: When Tom was walking down the street at night, a man he didn't know threatened him with a knife and robbed him of his cash.
The convicted drug dealer was willing to comply with the authorities to have his death sentence reduced to a life sentence.
Man is the only animal that learns by being hypocritical. He pretends to be polite and then, eventually, he becomes polite.
I wanted to visit Tom next Monday, but he said he was going to be busy, so I\'m planning to visit him the Monday after next.
